org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb
Interface IAeXMLDBStorageImpl

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeExistStorageImpl, AeTaminoStorageImpl
public interface IAeXMLDBStorageImpl

Instances of this interface must implement the parts of the XMLDB storage framework that are implementation specific.

Method Summary
 int deleteDocuments(java.lang.String aQuery, java.lang.String aDeleteDocType, IAeXMLDBConnection aConnection)
          Deletes the documents matching the given xquery.
 void deleteNonXMLDocument(long aDocumentId, IAeXMLDBConnection aConnection)
          Delets the non-xml content with the given ID from the xml database.
 IAeXMLDBDataSource getXMLDBDataSource()
          Gets the data source for the xml database.
 long insertDocument(java.io.Reader aReader, IAeXMLDBConnection aConnection)
          Inserts a document into the XML database.
 long insertNonXMLDocument(java.io.InputStream aInputStream, IAeXMLDBConnection aConnection)
          Insert the non-xml content in the xml database.
 java.io.InputStream retrieveNonXMLDocument(long aDocumentId, IAeXMLDBConnection aConnection)
          Retrieves the non-xml content from the xml database.
 int updateDocuments(java.lang.String aQuery, IAeXMLDBConnection aConnection)
          Updates the documents in the XML database using the given XQuery and returns the number of documents modified.

          Runs the xquery and returns the result.

deleteDocuments

public int deleteDocuments(java.lang.String aQuery,
                           java.lang.String aDeleteDocType,
                           IAeXMLDBConnection aConnection)
                    throws AeXMLDBException
Deletes the documents matching the given xquery. The aDeleteDocType param is a string representing the doc type we are deleting. Even if multiple doc types are being deleted, only a count of documents with this name will be returned. Not all XML databases will use this information.

Parameters:
aQuery -
aDeleteDocType -
aConnection -
Throws:
AeXMLDBException
